entries.journal_entry_description: Kill brigands until you find a datapad.  Return it to Gerak in Bestine.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: One of these brigands must have information about their main camp.  Kill them until you find a datapad with the waypoint.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the datapad, return to Gerak Vertimis so he can decipher its contents.
